title: Nike Air Max 90 Essential Men's Trainers Gym Training Running Shoes

description.itemDescription: Leather upper for optimised resistance and support. Dynamic padded tongue for added comfort. Phylon midsole for better stability. Visible Max Air unit in the heel for added cushioning and impact protection. Rubber outsole with embossed patterns for added grip. Material: Leather / Mesh Genuine Nike product
description.aboutUs: We're a genuine UK based company offering quality items at prices far cheaper than the high street. Every item is carefully packaged using the latest technology to ensure safe shipment to you. Enjoy your visit!
description.payment: We use Ebay managed payments for our ebay business , this means you can rest assured your order will be with you ASAP after your purchase. For your security we only despatch your order to the address you provide us via PayPal.All prices include 20% VAT.
description.shipping: Orders within the U.K. are dispatched via Royal Mail or our Courier the same working day or next working day if ordered after 3pm. Order should be received within 1 - 3 working days, but can take up to 7 under some circumstances.Orders outside the U.K. are sent via ebays distribution centre . Order should be received within 3 - 15 working days depending on your countries postal service.Please do not hesitate to contact us if you require further delivery information.
description.terms: We offer a no quibble 30 day money back guarantee. Please ensure that the item is returned to us in original, undamaged condition with all original packaging. Simply send the item back to the address on your invoice or open a Return Request from your eBay purchase history. Please include a note with your eBay username and full delivery address so that we are able to identify your parcel and process it as soon as possible. We will issue a full refund within 5 working days of receiving your return.If your item has arrived damaged or broken please contact us via eBay messages and we will gladly assist you with this.If you would like to exchange your item please contact us via eBay messages and we will gladly arrange this for you.Please do not hesitate to contact us if you require any further returns information.
description.returns: We offer a no quibble 30 day money back guarantee. Please ensure that the item is returned to us in original, undamaged condition with all original packaging. Simply send the item back to the address on your invoice or open a Return Request from your eBay purchase history. Please include a note with your eBay username and full delivery address so that we are able to identify your parcel and process it as soon as possible. We will issue a full refund within 5 working days of receiving your return.If your item has arrived damaged or broken please contact us via eBay messages and we will gladly assist you with this.If you would like to exchange your item please contact us via eBay messages and we will gladly arrange this for you.Please do not hesitate to contact us if you require any further returns information.

description.Narrative: The Nike Zoom Vomero 9 Running Shoes in Platinum/Black-White color combination are designed for men with a size 16 US shoe size. These athletic sneakers feature a stylish and colorful design, making them suitable for running and jogging activities. The product line of Nike Zoom ensures quality performance and comfort, ideal for active individuals looking for both style and functionality in their footwear.
